alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:17PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Sweet Grass and central Park Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 515 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Livingston, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rain, winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Watch out for water over the roads. Locations impacted include... Pine Creek, Springdale and Mc Leod. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley
